actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to require that certain drugs and pharmaceuticals be prominently labeled as to the date beyond which potency or efficacy becomes diminished.

summary.text: Prescription Drug Freshness Act - Requires the prominent labeling, as to the date beyond which the product shall not be used, of prescription and over-the-counter drugs and pharmaceuticals whose effectiveness or potency becomes diminished after storage. Authorizes the Food and Drug Administration to establish the "beyond use" dates for all applicable products and the manner in which they shall be labeled.

titles.title: A bill to require that certain drugs and pharmaceuticals be prominently labeled as to the date beyond which potency or efficacy becomes diminished.
